rocketuc.processing
Class ROCKETuC

java.lang.Object
  rocketuc.jrocket.JRocket
      rocketuc.jrocket.JRocketSerial
          rocketuc.processing.ROCKETuC
All Implemented Interfaces:
rocketuc.jrocket.comm.PacketEventHandler
public class ROCKETuC
extends rocketuc.jrocket.JRocketSerial

This calss implements the processing binding to ROCKETuC by extending JRocketSerial from the libjrocket library. Basically the only thing this class does is extending JRocketSerial with the things needed for processing integration.
